subject: RE: [Read_Alphabet] Re: Quickscript practice site
msgSnippet: Jerry, I also have Mozilla as my default browser,and it didn t work. (That s the bad news.) The good news is that I checked the source and found there were
messageBody:
Jerry, I also have Mozilla as my default browser,and it didn't work.
(That's the bad news.)
The good news is that I checked the source and found there were some
tags missing. (1 HEAD, 1 HTML, 1 BODY, no TRs or TDs).

I've taken the liberty of balancing the tags, so if you upload this code
below, it should work ok. Mozilla is known for being very insistent on
"well-formed" HTML.
************************************************************************
****

<html>
<head>
<title>Practice Quickscript!</title>
</head
<body bgcolor="navy" text="white" link="white" vlink="white"
alink="white">
<center>
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="435">
<tr>
<td>
<font size=8 face="Impact,arial">Practice Quickscript</font><br>
<font size=1 face="verdana">Name this sign:  <img
src="letters_wit/18.gif" border=1 alt="Letter 18"
align="absmiddle">  <a href="#"
onclick="(location.href='index.htm?0&0&en&18&2');">Skip</a></font><br>
<font face="impact,verdana,arial" size=5><a href="#"
onclick="location.href='index.htm?0&1&en&18&0';"
onmouseover="window.status=' ';return true;">n<br>
</a></font>
<font face="impact,verdana,arial" size=5><a href="#"
onclick="location.href='index.htm?0&1&en&18&0';"
onmouseover="window.status=' ';return true;">EA-t<br></a></font>
<font face="impact,verdana,arial" size=5><a href="#"
onclick="location.href='index.htm?0&1&en&18&0';"
onmouseover="window.status=' ';return true;">I-t<br></a></font>
<font face="impact,verdana,arial" size=5><a href="#"
onclick="location.href='index.htm?1&0&en&18&1';"
onmouseover="window.status=' ';return true;">w<br></a></font>
<font face="impact,verdana,arial" size=5><a href="#"
onclick="location.href='index.htm?0&1&en&18&0';"
onmouseover="window.status=' ';return true;">OU-t<br></a></font><br>
<font face="impact,verdana,arial" size=5 color="green">Points:
0</font><br>
<font face="impact,verdana,arial" size=5 color="red">Errors:
0</font><br>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</center>
</body>
</html>

*********************************************************











-----Original Message-----
From: steveb_667 [mailto:sbartok1632@...]
Sent: Sunday, May 23, 2004 8:08 AM
To: Read_Alphabet@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [Read_Alphabet] Re: Quickscript practice site


Great job! However, I couldn't get it to work in Mozilla.

--- In Read_Alphabet@yahoogroups.com, "Jerry" <nieuwsgroep222@x> wrote:
> Hi all!
>
> The last few days I've been making a practice site for quickscript. It
> randomly chooses quickscript signs which the visitor can name. It
features
> automatic dutch/English language selection.
>
> The address is:
>
> http://www.xs4all.nl/~ransau/quickscript/letters_oefenen/
>
> Please let me know what you think.
>
> Regards,
> Jerry
